name: Danganronpa V4 Catch
description:
Attributions:

Text font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/ruthless-two.font

Danganronpa Counter Sound Effect (I had to cut out part of it and add a fade in): Danganronpa V3 Sound Effect - Counter

 Beep sound effect for catching good object: https://opengameart.org/content/beep-tone-sound-sfx  

Sound effect for bad object: https://library-prosoundeffects-com.mutex.gmu.edu/#!details?id=5018466

Music (Hope vs Despair from Danganronpa, originally composed by Masafumi Takada): DANGANRONPA OST: -2-12- Discussion -HOPE VS DESPAIR- 

I provided the art for the catcher, hope, despair, background, and counter image for the counter sprite. I also provided the voiceline for the Minoru.

Game was made in Unity.
